entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.8.1
entry.content:
v0.8.1 CHANGELOG

PS! This contains changes aimed for only the docker release, no binaries are provided

[MISC] Docker container now tries to update yt-dlp before running Explo

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LumePart/Explo/compare/v0.8.0...v0.8.1

entry.title: New release for Explo: v0.10.0
entry.content:
v0.10.0 CHANGELOG

[FEATURE] Added support for Soulseek downloads using slskd - Requires a running Slskd instance. - Several new variables were introduced for configuration (see wiki).

[IMPROVEMENT] Large internal refactor - Modularized codebase to make future music system/download client integrations easier.

[IMPROVEMENT] More accurate song matching for all systems (thanks @avedor for Jellyfin & Emby implementation)

[FIX]
- Fixed #18 – thanks @firewalkwithm3
- Fixed #14 – thanks @avedor

[MISC]
- Environment variables in sample.env are now grouped by functionality
- A full Wiki is now available, including: - Quick setup - Docker volume schematics - Configuration reference - System-specific notes

[DEPRECATION]
- Removed legacy SUBSONIC_* variables (deprecated since v0.6.0)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/LumePart/Explo/compare/v0.8.4...v0.10.0
